videoDescription: The golden calf was a symbol for what the ancient tribe that stood before mount. Sinai decided was godly by their standard - gold, abundance and a physical closeness to a god. today we still have golden calf but they are no longer in a shape of a statue. we make them by todays standard.

items.description: Instead of one main character, every rule was supposed to be represented with a different person
